reviews.review: Buen juego, entretenido y con una buena historia, recomendado para que lo jueguen.
good but not as good as portal 1

Dark Humor Sci-Fi Puzzle game. Very Fun.
    One minor note of negativity: Best played in intervals. Not the kind of game I could play all day at least. It's not because it isn't amazing, I applaud that it challenges you to think in creative ways using theoretical physics. It's just that too many turret shots to the face in too short a time span, or simply playing too long at once makes me nauseated. Something about the red screen glare and/or the graphics used probably. The old DOS graphics had a way of doing that to me, maybe it's tangentially related. The game still kicks butt either way
    Advanced AI being evil, backstory on Chell and Glados and a wormhole of comic relief added to the game makes a recipe for an even more delicious cake. What more could you want?
Es un cago de risa, y constantemente te esta forreando con cualquier cosa que hagas la robot esta que no me acuerdo como se llama, recomenda3

Amazing game! There will be nothing like this game!!

Honestly one of the best games I have ever ever played. The story is done naturally and without exposition dumps, control is next to never taken away from me, and I am allowed to take the game where I want to. Even if the ending is fixed, the game feels amazing. The puzzles are challenging and make me use my brain, which kinda hurt (Chamber 19), but the game was great. There are games which cost $60-120 which are actually worth literally nothing, while this game should require you to saw off your legs to play. But I got this and Portal 1 for $2 total. I love valve!

A cute little game with great story. Those of you like me who has neglected it for all these years, go ahead and play it! :)

This game is surprisingly replayable, despite being a roughly 2 hour long puzzle game. i used to play portal 2 nonstop for hours on the xbox 360 version, and that was without mods or co-op (fuck xbox live and i have no friends). the pc version on top of co-op and a great singleplayer, has 3 high quality mods avalable for download directly through steam, an easy to use level editor, and by extension, an unlimited supply of puzzles to solve! definitely worth the price.
great game. lots of fun for one or two players
